blocked.text: Are you sure you want to block your card?
blocked.terms: Blocking the card will restrict all and any operations with it, but all card-related service fees will still be charged.

activate.text: Are you sure you want to activate your card?
activate.terms: If you activate the card, you will be able to use it for all kinds of transactions again. Reactivation is free of charge, all card-related service fees will remain the same. Would you like to activate your card?
